column5: DESCRIPTION
Counts demand data reads
Counts all demand data writes (RFOs)
Counts all demand code reads
Counts prefetch (that bring data to L2) data reads
Counts all prefetch (that bring data to L2) RFOs
Counts all prefetch (that bring data to LLC only) code reads
Counts all prefetch (that bring data to LLC only) data reads
Counts all prefetch (that bring data to LLC only) RFOs
Counts prefetch (that bring data to LLC only) code reads
Counts any other requests
Counts all prefetch data reads
Counts prefetch RFOs
Counts all prefetch code reads
Counts all demand & prefetch data reads
Counts all demand & prefetch RFOs
Counts all demand & prefetch code reads
Counts all data/code/rfo reads (demand & prefetch)
Counts all requests
hit in the L3
hit in the L3 and sibling core snoops are not needed as either the core-valid bit is not set or the shared line is present in multiple cores
hit in the L3 and the snoops sent to sibling cores return clean response
hit in the L3 and the snoops to sibling cores hit in either E/S state and the line is not forwarded
hit in the L3 and the snoop to one of the sibling cores hits the line in M state and the line is forwarded
miss in the L3
miss the L3 and the data is returned from local dram
